import React from "react"; import * as Components from "./Components"; import "./login.css"; export function Login() { const [signIn, toggle] = React.useState(true); return (
{signIn ? ( Sign in Forgot your password? Sigin In ) : ( Create Account Sign Up )} Welcome Back! To keep connected with us please login with your personal info toggle(true)}> Sign In Hello, Friend! Enter Your personal details and start journey with us toggle(false)}> Sign Up
); }
